amendment.description: To provide, with an offset, $10,000,000 for the Joint Advertising, Market Research and Studies program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4521 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4521 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6378) To provide, with an offset, $10,000,000 for the Joint Advertising, Market Research and Studies program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4521 proposed by Senator Warner.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4521 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
